task.summary: Bunch of work getting base app installing
Added activities. Fixed parent activity setup Fixed a couple of linting issues
Bunch of enhancements around content providers
Can add and get notified of new drugs
Fixed linting issues Fixed adding medications Implemented list of todays medicines
Rolled custom cursor adapter Allow adding of multiple days for a scheduled day

MESSAGE.value: Bunch of work getting base app installing
Added activities. Fixed parent activity setup Fixed a couple of linting issues
Bunch of enhancements around content providers
Can add and get notified of new drugs
Fixed linting issues Fixed adding medications Implemented list of todays medicines
Rolled custom cursor adapter Allow adding of multiple days for a scheduled day
